Workflow.Name: Request Orphaned Objects Reassigned (Parent)
Workflow.Description: On a weekly basis, this collects all the orphaned objects in the tenant and attempts to associate them with the manager of the former owner. It then sends a teams bot note to each impacted manager and let's them know that there are objects to clean, and then concurrently calls the child flow for each manager. For those orphaned objects which cannot resolve to a previous manager, it sends the list to the admin email so that admins know which orphaned objects will need cleaned manually.
